info.title: Platform API Protocol Handler
info.description: This is a protocol for formatting all the API responses.

method.name: setResponseCode
method.description: Set the header response status code.

method.name: setStatus
method.description: Set the response header status code.

parameter.name: $code
parameter.description: The response status code. The default value is 1.

method.name: setRedirect
method.description: Set a redirect header value for the client.

method.name: addHeader
method.description: Adds a header to the response.

parameter.name: $header
parameter.description: A header context. It can be string, number or array.

parameter.name: $key
parameter.description: The header key value. If set, the content will be available at the given key, otherwise it will inserted in the array with a numeric key (next array key).

method.name: addContent
method.description: Adds a response data content to the api response.

parameter.name: $content
parameter.description: The response content data. It can be string, number or array.

parameter.name: $key
parameter.description: The header key value. If set, the content will be available at the given key, otherwise it will inserted in the array with a numeric key (next array key).

method.name: getResponse
method.description: Returns the API Response in JSON format.

parameter.name: $allowOrigin
parameter.description: The allow origin header value for the ServerReport response headers. If empty, calculate the inner allow origin of the framework (more secure). It is wildcard ("*") by default.

parameter.name: $withCredentials
parameter.description: The allow credentials header value for the API response headers. It is FALSE by default.
